title: Have an idea?
short-description: Join our Slack room #splunk4good to share your idea on working with other interesting datasets or partners!

title: Wunderground (Weather)
short-description: Current and forecast weather data for each Splunk office locations. Data provided by Wunderground API.

title: Hurricane Harvey
short-description: Wunderground dataset for various Texas cities during Hurricane Harvey. Also includes tracking information of the hurricane.

title: 2017-2018 Splunk4Good Splunktern Summer Final Projects
short-description: Scores for the S4G intern teams on their S4G final summer projects. The winning group had $1000 donated to a charity of their choice!

title: San Francisco Muni Buses
short-description: Current location of all SF Muni buses. Data provided by SFMTA's NextMuni.

title: NHTSA FARS
short-description: Accident data from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration's Fatality Analysis Reporting System for 2015. App originally by Jason Hupka (Splunker).

title: 2016 Presidential Election Independent Expenditures
short-description: Independent expenditure spending by committees (ie super PACs) during the 2016 presidential election. Election data provided by the Federal Election Commission API. Poll data provided by HuffPost's Pollster API.

title: San Francisco Tree Maintenance
short-description: A smarter tree maintenance schedule based on location, last pruned date, and tree species. Data provided by SF Public Works. This project was featured by the mayor's 2017 Civic Bridge program.

title: Intrinio Fintech (Stock Prices)
short-description: Current stock prices of various tech companies. Data provided by Intrinio API.

title: Open Exchange Rates
short-description: Current exchange rate of various global currencies. Data provided by Open Exchange Rates API.

title: Human Trafficking
short-description: A sample of web scrapes performed by Global Emancipation Network using on public listing (mostly escort pages) that are potentially related to human trafficking.

title: California Drought
short-description: Various drought-related data in California during the severe drought from 2014 to 2015. App originally by Aamir Goriawala (former Splunk intern).

title: IRS Form 990 (Nonprofits)
short-description: Form 990 (officially, the "Return of Organization Exempt From Income Tax") is a United States Internal Revenue Service form that provides the public with financial information about a nonprofit organization. It is often the only source of such information. The public dataset includes forms from 2011 to 2017 and is provided by Amazon S3.

title: Splunk Security Essentials for Fraud Detection
short-description: These detection use cases were implemented using the Search Processing Language (SPL) and the Machine Learning Toolkit (MLTK). The use cases include example data sets so you may run them yourself. After learning about these examples, you can start to experiment with similar scenarios with your own data using Splunk Enterprise.

title: Twitter Election Integrity
short-description: Twitter publicly released archives of Tweets and media that they believe resulted from potentially state-backed information operations on their service. The dataset includes information from 3,841 accounts believed to be connected to the Russian Internet Research Agency, and 770 accounts believed to originate in Iran.

title: National Data Buoy Center (NDBC)
short-description: The premier source of meteorological and oceanographic measurements for the marine environment by the National Data Buoy Center. Includes data from over 600 stations. App by Julien Ruaux.

title: The GDELT Project
short-description: The GDELT Project monitors the world's broadcast, print, and web news from nearly every corner of every country in over 100 languages and identifies the people, locations, organizations, themes, sources, emotions, counts, quotes, images and events driving our global society every second of every day, creating a free open platform for computing on the entire world.
